ValidationRule.description: Verifies all final testing information fields are answered before final payroll is input
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT(ISNULL( Final_Census_Payroll_Submitted__c ))
&&
ISCHANGED ( Final_Census_Payroll_Submitted__c )
&&
(
ISBLANK (TEXT( RKO_Plan__c )) || ISBLANK (TEXT( Final_Payroll_In_Terminated_Year__c )) || ISBLANK (TEXT( Safe_Harbor_Plan__c )) || ISBLANK (TEXT( Does_the_Plan_Have_Forfeitures__c )) || ISBLANK (TEXT( Is_Plan_Vesting_100__c ))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Answer all questions in the "Final Testing Information" section
